0.3.1.name: wordpress/yt-tree-menu
0.3.1.description: 'YT Tree Menu' is a widget plugin that displays a menu of all pages in relation to the current page in a CMS tree style layout. The menu is filtered to only list specific pages including child pages. The blog page and posts are supported and it also has the option to exclude items and sort the menu by different columns.
